TITLE: Episode 60 - Don’t Vote for Rabid Women [Adult Language]
DESCRIPTION: This week, I am joined by Joshua Ferguson of Hourly Struggle fame. We talk about why the LP deserves to die, why you shouldn’t vote for Jo Jorgensen, the case for defensive voting, labels of no utility, bump stocks, and the lack of nuance in low-status tyrants.
